hero.title: IINIA Industrial Intelligence & AI Solutions
hero.subtitle: We combine multicloud connectivity, dedicated GPU compute, and sector expertise to take your AI use cases into production.
hero.supporting: Flō Networks, EXXACTcorp, and NVIDIA power our platform to keep your AI operations available and high-performing anywhere.

value_props.title: Ecosystem ready for production
value_props.subtitle: Infrastructure, connectivity, and industrial know-how unified in a single team.
value_props.prop_1_desc: Flō Networks provides international connectivity and multicloud environments so our solutions stay available everywhere.
value_props.prop_2_desc: EXXACTcorp and NVIDIA equip us with cutting-edge H200 SXM GPUs for high-performance AI workloads.
value_props.prop_3_desc: Teleflex, Hubbell, and other industrial leaders validate our solutions and co-create sector-specific use cases.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: September, 2025
about.main_intro: We are an artificial intelligence spin-off in Ciudad Juárez that drives talent development and creates solutions for the industry, improving efficiency, quality and competitiveness.
about.main_desc: We can offer all AI solutions on public/private cloud or deploy them on-premises. We conduct technology maturity assessments using the SIRI methodology.
about.llm_title: LLM on-premises or in the cloud
about.vision_1_desc: Automatic detection of surface defects in products
about.vision_2_desc: PPE monitoring, intrusion detection and access control
about.vision_3_desc: Access control, compliance verification and personnel management
